lines.speaker: Gustavo
lines.text: Where is the voice from before?

lines.speaker: Gustavo
lines.text: Did I imagine the voice from back then?

lines.speaker: Gustavo
lines.text: Surrounded by strange things in a strange place?

lines.speaker: Gustavo
lines.text: I even found weapons lying around before that

lines.speaker: Gustavo
lines.text: I'm either going crazy or this has to be a dream

lines.speaker: T.O.M.
lines.text: Someone who can help you get out of here

lines.speaker: T.O.M.
lines.text: Don't you want to leave? Better hurry up and follow.
